column1: America’s democracy and freedoms must not be taken for granted. We are indebted to our veterans and their families who have made incredible sacrifices to protect it. Today and every day we are grateful for those who served. #veteransday https://t.co/WIpIVbJAOI
https://t.co/Tm8UBpPv16
This election is so important. #VOTE https://t.co/FGKDStFJQu
Make sure your voice is heard - polls open until 9 PM. https://t.co/dnHBIzFopc

It’s #ElectionDay! Polls are open until 9pm.   Visit this link to double check your polling place in Niagara County: https://t.co/piETNU81Tw   Unsure of your polling location in Erie County? Click here: https://t.co/3FE6Jz4Zj5 https://t.co/oTOpZFUwfW

@USMC veteran Monica Lynch sent this picture from her polling place. She is one of the first Black women from WNY to serve in combat. Monica & many others made great sacrifices to protect our democracy. She reminds us that voting provides us all an opportunity to defend it #vote https://t.co/jf4KPRqd3z
Great to be with Assemblymember @MonicaPWallace greeting voters in Cheektowaga this morning.  Polls are open until 9pm. #GOTV https://t.co/Ezwu7TnihG
Election Day is here!  If you haven’t voted early make a plan to vote today. Polls are open in Erie and Niagara Counties from 6am until 9pm.  #VOTE https://t.co/DHsNpArnv9
Early voting continues for Niagara County residents today and tomorrow from 10am until 3pm.  #vote https://t.co/XjjcBS3UGw

Have your absentee ballot already? Want to drop it off but you’re concerned about long lines? Don’t worry. You can take your ballot to any one of Erie County’s 37 early voting locations. You can skip the line and hand your ballot to an inspector on duty. https://t.co/3jGqjthFCg

The grassroots advocates @NYAGV1 work tirelessly to promote gun safety to protect our children and our communities. I am proud to have their endorsement and look forward to pushing for common sense gun safety laws in the 117th Congress.  #GunSenseCandidate https://t.co/D7m8dOjoZg

Since Saturday nearly 70000 Erie County residents have voted early.  Early voting sites are open again today from noon until 9pm.  Residents can cast their votes at any one of the 37 early voting sites regardless of the town or city in which you live.  #VOTE https://t.co/NCQkhxk1yA

Yesterday we visited the Cheektowaga early voting site with @MonicaPWallace & @ZellnerforECDC.  We are seeing great energy from Western New York voters.  Keep it up!  Early voting in Erie County: https://t.co/yAPuPWUwXU  Early voting in Niagara County: https://t.co/nHUj5mh3MP https://t.co/Hh1QJBuvLw
Have you mailed in your ballot? NYS accepts ballots postmarked by November 3 but it's never too early to make sure your vote counts. https://t.co/Ar08sjvqu0

One year ago @JoeBiden said that our country was not ready for a public health risk like COVID-19. Under this President’s failed leadership our country now faces the biggest case counts since the outbreak began. It didn’t have to be this bad. #vote https://t.co/unMm9vLrte

This President doesn’t acknowledge that our frontline workers are essential to fight COVID-19. We need to get out there and get #soulstothepolls to elect @joebiden to help our country overcome the biggest health crisis we have faced in a century. #voteearlyday https://t.co/TcLC2Gd5df
We need a change in the White House. Pastor Mark Blue President of @BuffaloNAACP says “We have a new hashtag: #yourefired.” #MyVoteIsEssential #SoulstothePolls #VoteEarlyDay https://t.co/oOP2A519VV

Western NY is excited to vote! Early voting begins today. We are helping get “souls to the polls” with @1199SEIU @rashwyatt @aprilbaskinld2 & @timmeyersec7. 2020 is a crucial election that will direct our country’s future. #MyVoteIsEssential. https://t.co/V8EmhaFpI9

Congress must both protect the future of Social Security and Medicare and pass legislation to enhance and expand these earned benefits and improve financial security in retirement. It can be done. I am thankful for the endorsement of @ActiveRetirees https://t.co/PGr51ljfqi

Have you made a plan to vote yet? Early voting in NY-26 begins tomorrow and runs through Sunday November 1st. Find your early voting locations at: https://t.co/fjS46kyXXB or https://t.co/2UXvAtK4Pp and make your plan to vote today! https://t.co/JEOS3MyCh3

We must preserve the important gains we have made and continue the fight toward achieving equality for all LGBTQ+ Americans. Alongside @HRC we will continue work to pass legislation in Congress to secure those rights. #uniteforequality https://t.co/pYAKMtApP2

I am proud to be endorsed by @NewtownAction. We can reduce gun violence and keep our children safe if Congress takes action on common sense gun safety laws. I have supported that and will continue to. #VoteGunSafety2020 https://t.co/86JlezmoWo
Thank you @JoeBiden. The US cannot enter into a free trade agreement with the UK unless the Good Friday Agreement is upheld. https://t.co/O1r7VIsAsT
Have you signed up to get a Higgins for Congress lawn sign yet? Use the link below to have one delivered safely to your home!  https://t.co/LMVDIUyhVE https://t.co/xTL4lLkrOu
Proud to have the support of the WNY Area Labor Federation. Thank you to all those in labor who continuously fight for our community. https://t.co/qLMbrgYbHJ
REMINDER: You will need to reapply for an absentee ballot for the general election even if you received an absentee ballot for this year's primary election.

Due to the COVID-19 pandemic voting by absentee ballot is a safe way to vote if you don't feel comfortable going to the polls. You can request an absentee ballot for the general election easily online. https://t.co/6KfxyGntpR

At 7pm we join @ECDems in celebrating the kick-off of the Democratic National Convention.  Then tune in to the #DemConvention from 9-11pm. Tonight's theme: "We the People" https://t.co/BRecVPn9aF https://t.co/SWLI7i8A8t

The 2020 election is a pivotal moment for our democracy. @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris are the team to help our country meet this moment confront our challenges and help us #buildbackbetter together. #VOTE #BidenHarris2020

In his parting op-ed Congressman John Lewis reminded us: “Ordinary people with extraordinary vision can redeem the soul of America by getting into what I call #goodtrouble necessary trouble. Voting & participating in the democratic process are key.” #VOTE https://t.co/5afHtAq9Hg

We will not stand by as the Trump Administration plots to dismantle the USPS and diminish the vital services dedicated postal workers provide to our communities. We support our #HeroesDelivering and back legislation to #FundtheFrontLines #SaveThePostOffice https://t.co/OmCY57skdH

. @joebiden warned us in October 2019 how unprepared the Trump Admin was to face a pandemic. We need to elect him in November to help build our country back better. #BuildBackBetter https://t.co/unMm9vLrte

I am thankful for the endorsement of @NationalNurses for the #2020Election. Nurses face challenges every day but especially now as we confront the #covid19 pandemic. #VoteNursesValues https://t.co/vTEaFyjS7r
In less than 100 days Americans will vote to set our country on a better path. We must do everything we can - our future depends on it. #TeamJoe https://t.co/L2oa15b3Ku
It’s unacceptable that 4 months into the #COVID19 pandemic we still face #ppe shortages and testing result delays and appalling that Trump calls testing “overrated.”

This is why this year's election is critical. We can't have a President whose main strategy to combat this pandemic is to hope it disappears. We need real leadership in the White House. https://t.co/ExYkJMOBV4
Now is the time to invest in both the infrastructure you can see and that which you can't see. @joebiden has a bold plan to build our country back better. See the plan here: https://t.co/8NdTsbYeJ4
As November 3rd approaches our progress is on the line. Help me send a clear message that we want to keep moving forward. A donation of any amount is greatly appreciated. https://t.co/NMykoQTjbn
@JoeBiden is right. We need a President who can and wants to bring this country together again. @WNYforBiden https://t.co/qGZgHD1kML
It's finally Special Election Day in NY-27. If you haven't voted yet please safely get out and support @Nate_McMurray today! https://t.co/5uSksGTVIq
Pleased to follow you here from our campaign account @People4Biden. Hope you’re staying safe and you’ll give us a follow back.

#COVID19 is impacting every aspect of our lives including elections. This is a defining moment in protecting our right to vote. @MoveOn is right: Congress must support $4B to increase access to voter registration expand early voting and allow all Americans to #VoteByMail https://t.co/cBlcvB6DH5
A special live concert happening today provides an opportunity to follow #covid19 guidelines to #stayathome while also making a difference in the lives of local veterans. https://t.co/FMUhSAsW1g

This is no time for politics but thank you to the nearly 9000 voters & 100s of vols who circulated. We really appreciate your efforts. We will get through this. If you're out there on the front lines of this crisis thank you! Everyone else -- please stay home and stay well. https://t.co/Ja6pykGnC3

As we and the people of this community turn our attention to public health we recognize the stressors that come with emergency situations and will continue to be here for you.  Thank you for your continued friendship and support.

In accordance with New York State and Erie County recommendations for public events and in light of confirmed cases of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in Erie County we are postponing our event scheduled for Thursday March 19.

Just back from DC & proud to join with the Unity Coalition for breakfast. They are our great friends & I’m honored to have their continued support. In times like this especially trusted leadership & good neighbors make all the difference & Unity is dedicated to that mission. https://t.co/OqHOHoDT5A

Proud to earn the unanimous endorsement of the @NiagCountyDems. My thanks go out to @NiagCoDemChair Jason Zona and all Niagara Falls and North Tonawanda committee members for their support. On to a Democratic victory in November! https://t.co/K0ldUX52uo

Our community and country are stronger when people step up speak out and participate.  Please join me in attending this event to learn more about how we can work together to make a difference.  https://t.co/2uxSky1LLn https://t.co/IEs3jLUqLS
It's critical that NY send more Democrats to Congress in 2020. That's why I'm endorsing @Nate_McMurray in the upcoming NY-27 special election. https://t.co/Xv36128VCO
Thank you to the @ecdems committee and Chair @zellnerforECDC. We are grateful for your  continued support and hard work. Together we can make a difference in Western New York. https://t.co/KQV7Kq6plZ
Thank you to @NiagCoDemChair Jason Zona and to the members of the NC Dems’ executive committee for their confidence and support. https://t.co/uHoKltZSjd
